PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The PCE level is the highest reported to date in the side - chain D-A conjugated copolymersbased single BHJ PSCs , which is twice higher than that of the corresponding main - chain D-A polymer - based ones.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Name" entities in the given paragraph:

1. PCE (Property Name Entity) - This is the highest reported level of the PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) in the side-chain D-A conjugated copolymers based single BHJ PSCs.
2. main-chain D-A polymer (Property Name Entity) - This refers to the corresponding main-chain D-A polymer based PSCs, which have a lower PCE level than the side-chain D-A conjugated copolymers.

So, the two Property Name Entities in the paragraph are:

1. PCE
2. main-chain D-A polymer
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Of course! Here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to Material Properties:

1. PCE (Property Name Entity) - This refers to the Power Conversion Efficiency of the material.

So, the only relevant entity in the paragraph that refers to a Material Property is:

1. PCE

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to Material Properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE |

The entities are presented precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The PCE level is the highest reported to date in the side - chain D-A conjugated copolymersbased single BHJ PSCs , which is twice higher than that of the corresponding main - chain D-A polymer - based ones.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Let's break down the paragraph and identify the entities related to "Property Value" one by one:

1. "PCE level": This is a property value, as it refers to the level of a specific property (PCE, or Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) of the material being discussed.
2. "twice higher": This is a comparison of two property values, specifically the PCE level of the side-chain D-A conjugated copolymers and the corresponding main-chain D-A polymer-based ones.

So, there are two property values mentioned in the paragraph:

1. PCE level
2. PCE level of the main-chain D-A polymer-based ones (which is being compared to the PCE level of the side-chain D-A conjugated copolymers)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Of course! Here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph:

1. "PCE level": This is a property value, as it refers to the level of photovoltaic conversion efficiency of the material being discussed.

So, there is one entity that refers to the value of a material property in the paragraph:

1. PCE level

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities related to material properties in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":
